title: Did I miss end of season?
body:
I was lucky and I unlocked champions before BE came into effect. I just got done with my rank games and I was wondering did I miss end of season rewards? 
I got into S4 and I really want that silver boarder

replies.body:
If you got into it before the new patch, then you made it, turns out that they decided to release Pre season a day early (people who defend this never read the post itself, it said MIDNIGHT of november 7, which was a lie)

I believe it'd be around 4am November 7 that the Pre season started, so anything past that is not counted.
If you got into silver 4 then you would have been silver 5 before the patch so you'll still get the border

No fresh level account no rank history ever. Until now.
Didnt do rank until Wednesday. That was when I got RP for boxes and started placements. Never done rank before that on this account.

Before that I was B5. Glad I got banned on that account now.
? the season didn't end early, it ended at 4am AEDT on Nov 7th, which is exactly what the end of season page said. Midnight of Nov 7 would be four hours earlier than it actually ended anyway...
